HotelElement.Name: Royal Muang Samui Villas (Formerly Muang samui villas & suites)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Royal Muang Samui Villas in Koh Samui (Bo Put), you'll be convenient to Samui Football Golf and Big Buddha Statue. This 4-star resort is within close proximity of Jungle Minigolf and Mini Golf International.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 79 air-conditioned rooms featuring private spa tubs and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the resort's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a ferry terminal shuttle.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the resort's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Samui Football Golf - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Jungle Minigolf - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Mini Golf International - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Wat Plai Laem - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Big Buddha Beach Pier - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Samui Crocodile Farm - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Wat Phra Yai - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Big Buddha Statue - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Bangrak Beach - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Central Festival Samui - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Fishermans Village - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi

Chaweng Thai Boxing Stadium - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Bo Phut Beach Pier - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Thai International Hospital - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi

The preferred airport for Royal Muang Samui Villas is Ko Samui (USM) - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
